New_Haven.North Haven station:
North Haven is a planned regional rail station on the New Haven–Springfield Line near Route 40 and Route 5 in North Haven, Connecticut, to be served by the Hartford Line service. The station has been funded for design but not yet construction; it will not be complete for the Hartford Line's January 2018 opening, but instead is planned to open in 2019 or 2020.
The first North Haven station opened on Broadway in 1838 on the Hartford and New Haven Railroad.
